comments:
Description:
Open an existing report design containing a chart in it, error pops up when preview.

Steps to reproduce:
1.Get the attached design file.
2.Open this report design in the latest build, and open the chart builder. In the "Select Data" tab, there is no data displayed in the data preview windows.

Error message:
Error0 : Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 22 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: There are errors evaluating script "row["AfterPrintName"]". at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ExecutionContext.evaluate(ExecutionContext.java:520) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ExecutionContext.evaluate(ExecutionContext.java:482) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.DteResultSet.evaluate(DteResultSet.java:275) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.extension.internal.RowSet.evaluate(RowSet.java:107) at org.eclipse.birt.chart.reportitem.ChartReportItemGenerationImpl.onRowSets(ChartReportItemGenerationImpl.java:166)

Suggest cancelling this bug.
Users must add column bindings to access data, besides binding dataset.
Since adding data binding feature, user should add data binding manually.
Old reports must still be supported, without any additional change from the user.
The data should be displayed automatically, without any user action.
Backward compatibility changes should take care of this scenario.
Chart has implemented ICompatibleReportItem interface, DE will be responsible to generate corresponding column bindings.
Dependes on the DtE provided utility method.

Once the DtE utility ready, please also make the change for ExtendedItem.

Thanks!

After inter-team discussion about bound data columns for Chart, we used a new
way to support this feature. 

Fixed this bug.

Get the attached design file, the data prview of chart builder is still blank. Preview result is blank too.
Reopen this bug.
It seems the testing build does not contain this fix. I will have a check in the next build.
